author: Jack de Menezes, Jack de Menezes
title: Coronavirus: Tyson Fury tells British public to 'listen to Boris and stay at home' over UK lockdown
description: WBC heavyweight world champion is adhering to public health advice and remaining at home where he has installed a makeshift gym after admitting 'I'm finished' if he cannot continue his training
content:
World heavyweight champion Tyson Fury has issued a message to his fans instructing them to listen to Boris and stay at home following the extreme measures taken to place the United Kingdom on lockdown.
Prime Minister Boris Johnson implemented a three-week lo… [+3497 chars]
